name: Marek cilf Polcar
body:
### Welcome

My US experience captured thru random notes and funny pictures. For more visit [utep.cilf.cz](http://utep.cilf.cz) ;)

Interested in my life? [CV - Resume](https://www.dropbox.com/s/nnsjhvx8llnsyz1/marek_polcar_resume.pdf)

Wanna get in touch? Shoot me an email at [marek@cilf.cz](marek@cilf.cz) or use whatever you like:
* [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/cilf.ik)
* [LinkedIn](http://cz.linkedin.com/pub/marek-polcar/3b/943/828)
* [Twitter](http://twitter.com/MarekPolcar)
* [Last.fm](http://www.last.fm/user/cilf)

Bank account # 670100-2200279463/6210 (mBanka).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
